page.title: 09HOLY TRINITY CHOIR
page.content: I am in the church choir at Holy Trinity Church,Stratford _ on _Avon.We wear special clothes like cassocks, surplices and ruffs.We also have ribbons to show how high up in the choir we are.The choristers have teams (Hathaway,Nash,Hall and Shakespeare) and we have thick dark blue ribbons if we are team leaders.The order of the church serice goes like this_first we process in and bow down and sit down. After that the rector publishes the banns of marriage.Then we sing setting and have gospel and sermons.We then have the sacrament while the choir sing anthems in the chancel in front of Shakespeare's tomb.Then we sing a hymn and process out. At the end of a wedding we get about Â£3.00 each for just singing three hymns.At the end of a term we get about Â£10.00.
